name: Antibody (AHouston)
description:
Antibody is a top down turn based wave survival where your goal is to fend off waves of viruses that have invaded the body. Armed with an array of weapons you must defeat the viruses and keep the body safe, even though this task seems impossible for a single antibody, you must stand your ground.

This game was created based on the theme of "Quarantine" for a college course. I'm not a very experienced developer and i know there are some bugs, but any and all feed back is appreciated. Just please do not be too harsh.
